products.name: Mount Elgon Arabica
products.description: Grown on the slopes of Mount Elgon, this premium Arabica features bright acidity with notes of citrus and dark chocolate.

products.name: Rwenzori Mountain Reserve
products.description: From the legendary Mountains of the Moon, this naturally processed coffee delivers complex fruit flavors.

products.name: Bugisu Robusta
products.description: Full-bodied Robusta with low acidity, perfect for espresso blends and strong coffee lovers.

products.name: Lake Victoria Blend
products.description: A harmonious blend of Arabica and Robusta from farms around Lake Victoria, offering the best of both worlds.

products.name: Sipi Falls Premium
products.description: Named after the stunning Sipi Falls, this honey-processed coffee is sweet and aromatic.

products.name: Mukono Estate
products.description: From our local Mukono estates, this washed Robusta offers clean, bold flavors with great crema.

products.name: Masaka Dark Roast
products.description: Intense dark roast Robusta perfect for those who love a powerful, no-nonsense cup of coffee.

products.name: Mbale Highland Arabica
products.description: Elegant highland Arabica with exceptional clarity and delicate fruit notes.

products.name: Pearl Signature Blend
products.description: Our flagship blend combining the finest Ugandan beans for a perfectly balanced daily coffee.

products.name: Kigezi Highlands
products.description: Rare high-altitude Arabica from the southwestern highlands, naturally processed for maximum fruit expression.

products.name: Jinja Breakfast Blend
products.description: A gentle morning blend that's easy drinking with low acidity, perfect for starting your day.

products.name: Fort Portal Forest
products.description: Shade-grown under forest canopy, this honey-processed coffee is sweet and sustainably produced.

products.name: Mbarara Robusta Gold
products.description: Premium Robusta with a creamy body and subtle sweetness, excellent for milk-based drinks.

products.name: Kabarole Estate Reserve
products.description: Our most exclusive single-origin Arabica, meticulously processed for competition-level quality.

products.name: Nile Valley Espresso
products.description: Specially crafted for espresso, this blend creates a thick crema with rich chocolate notes.

products.name: Tororo Organic Arabica
products.description: Certified organic Arabica with bright, clean flavors from sustainable farming practices.
